TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Because you eat another customer's meal. 

Bartender! Potion please. 

Also a new page please. 

Edited April 10, 2022 by Abel101126

Do you prefer a pot of positive or negative ions, sir?

Food bringer! A killed and fried bird, please.

Just sending that order out to Jeb's Diner for you.

Customer: Is there gluten in this soup?

It's easier to say what is not in this soup.

Beertender! A glass of vodka and beer together! And yes, it's a ruffe.

Medical alcohol? Yes we have! 

Waiter! Inject please.

Sorry, sir, but the car service is next door. They can help you with injectors, carburetors, and gimbals.

Beartender! Aaargh! Food!

Please go to Jeb's diner. 

Waiter! Jeb please.

Jeb bless.

W8ter! Water!

Gr8, W8, 4, Pl8

Customer: Is this alpha dog soup.

Previously. It got into the soup on trying to bite our cook, so now that's him alpha cook.

Barateonder! Two fresh lannisters and lemon!

Sir, this is not the bar.

Serveur! Shall I tell you that my soup has intoxicants?

Nah, dude. 

Charlie Oscar Kilo Echo please. (Written in US army radio codes)

November Oscar Papa Echo

Is Baker Able?

Waiter: Cobler (Pie)

Customer: Is that Gidget riding a wave in my soup?

November Oscar Papa Echo 

Echo Golf Golf please.

Are you sure that our food court is enough wide to play golf and hear echo?

Waiter! Blackberry on Raspberry, please!

Waiter: Summer soup coming up.

Customer: There is a FireFly in my soup, it is putting out my fire.

We can bring you a FireBird instead, before FireFox can steal it.

Bouncer! What do you bounce from?

Atlantis, my pal! 

Pal! Give me your Steam friend code please.

I don't have Steam friends. Feel free tou get all those codes if you wish.

Cook! Stop doing that!

What? I'm a waiter. 

Bartender! Warp engine please.

One, sir?

Taxi! Return to the assembly building!

No! Assassins ahead! 

Waiter! Dihydrogen monoxide please.

Here is your water. In form of clathrates.

Waitender! Ice dice and mint pint.

Waiter: Will mint choc chip icecream do?

Customer: 2 more scoops in my bowl thank you.
